example.parse: (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS كانت) (NP-1 (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM اليمن)) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS تعاقدت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP-CLR (PREP على) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN شراء) (NP (NP (NOUN_NUM 16) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC طائرة))) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NP (DEM_PRON_MS هذا)) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN النوع))))))

arg.g: To buy 16 aircraft of this type

example.arg: على شراء 16 طائرة من هذا النوع
